projects.title: Happy Thoughts
projects.text: This project focus on the use of component Lifecycle, useEffect(ReactHook), fetching and posting  data to an API while building a Twitter (X)-like project.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.text: On this project I worked on building a simple weather dashboard that uses a weather API to tell today's weather and temperature and a 4-day forecast.

projects.title: Music Releases
projects.text: This project entails building a responsive React web application that displays music album releases, mimicking a user experience similar to browsing on Spotify.

projects.title: Chatbot
projects.text: On this project is all about building a functional chatbot interface using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. You'll create a captivating chatbot that can interact with users, ask questions, display messages, and respond with precision

projects.title: Pizzeria
projects.text: This project was the introduction to JavaScript world, by practicing vital yet basic JavaScript concepts like variables, conditionals, and native methods
